synopsis.text: This anime is an anthology series that chronicles strange and supernatural tales from around the world. Across multiple episodes, it delves into urban legends, paranormal encounters, mystical forces, and unexplained phenomena. The stories are recounted in a retro, pulp-horror style reminiscent of mystery magazines from the 1960s and 70s. Each chilling vignette is self-contained, following diverse characters as they uncover ancient curses, cross paths with sinister creatures, stumble upon advanced civilizations hidden throughout history, develop uncanny abilities, traverse bizarre realms, and more. Though varying in specifics, the creepy tales are connected by an overriding sense of the weird and macabre. The show aims to evoke a twilight-zone atmosphere filled with suspense and intrigue, leaving viewers to ponder the dark mysteries that lurk just beneath the surface of our everyday reality. With its rich anthology format, retro aesthetics, and focus on all things cryptic and supernatural, this anime promises to be an eerie, engaging examination of the fantastical and frightening tales born from the depths of human imagination.
